snippet: The Knicks lost for the 10th time in 12 games, despite a season-high 34 points from Amar’e Stoudemire, a rejuvenated offense and solid performances throughout the starting lineup.
abstract: Chicago Bulls defeat New York Knicks, 105-102, in NBA action.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks lost for the 10th time in 12 games, despite a season-high 34 points from Amar’e Stoudemire, a rejuvenated offense and solid performances throughout the starting lineup.

headline.seo: Stoudemire Scores 34, but Knicks Fall to Rose and Bulls
headline.main: Rose and the Bulls Counter Stoudemire’s Best Game of the Season
headline.print_headline: Rose and the Bulls Counter Stoudemire’s Best Game of the Season
